question: Find the greatest number that will divide 43, 91 and 183 so as to leave the same remainder in each case?
3 pumps, working 8 hours a day, can empty a tank in 2 days. How many hours a day must 4 pumps work to empty the tank in 1 day?
A man walked diagonally across a square lot. Approximately, what was the percent saved by not walking along the edges?
If A is the brother of B; B is the sister of C; and C is the father of D, how D is related to A?
Introducing a boy, a girl said, 'He is the son of the daughter of the father of my uncle.' How is the boy related to the girl?
A, P, R, X, S and Z are sitting in a row. S and Z are in the centre. A and P are at the ends. R is sitting to the left of A. Who is to the right of P?
In the series 2, 6, 18, 54, ...... what will be the 8th term ?
